<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Castigating Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=290) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 125 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Holy Castigation](/Feats.aspx?ID=268)

</column>

---

The force of your deity’s castigation strengthens your body so you can strike down the wicked. After you damage a fiend using a [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell, your weapon or unarmed Strikes deal extra good damage to fiends equal to half the level of the _heal_ spell until the end of your next turn. This is cumulative with any good damage the weapon already deals (such as from a holy rune).
name: Castigating Weapon
